name: Magical Mushroom Grove
description:
The fall is here and its time to make potions from the local, seasonal mushrooms. Explore the mushroom grove and collect the mushrooms you need for your potion recipes and throw them into the cauldron as the recipes demands. Can you manage to brew all potions?

Things I still want to add:

- Actual potions getting created from recipes
- More soundFX and some music
- Refining and extending the area
- Refining the assets
- More mushrooms, more trees, more everything
- Secret hidden recipes to find
- A Cave

Credits:

The Font is from the Dawnbringer Tileset: - https://opengameart.org/content/dawnlike-16x16-universal-rogue-like-tileset-v181

The Game was made for the Cozy Autumn Jam 2022

The Game is made with the Godot Game Engine v3.5
